original_text: I need someone to speak to God on my behalf. He should ask God not to punish me, as someone might try to help his friends. I need someone to speak to God on my behalf. He should ask God not to punish me, as someone might try to help his friends. I need someone to speak to God on my behalf.
korean_text: 사람과 하나님 사이에와 인자와 그 이웃 사이에 중재하시기를 원하노니

sentences.original_text: I need someone to speak to God on my behalf.
sentences.korean_translation: 내 편에서 하나님께 말해줄 사람이 필요합니다.

sentences.original_text: He should ask God not to punish me,
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 하나님께 내를 벌하지 않도록 요청해야 합니다.

sentences.original_text: as someone might try to help his friends.
sentences.korean_translation: 마치 누군가 자신의 친구들을 돕려고 노력하는 것처럼.

sentences.original_text: I need someone to speak to God on my behalf.
sentences.korean_translation: 내 편에서 하나님께 말해줄 사람이 필요합니다.

sentences.korean_translation: 그는 하나님께 내를 벌하지 않도록 요청해야 합니다.

sentences.original_text: as someone might try to help his friends.
sentences.korean_translation: 마치 누군가 자신의 친구들을 돕려고 노력하는 것처럼.

sentences.korean_translation: 내 편에서 하나님께 말해줄 사람이 필요합니다.
